{"step_by_step_thinking": "Bifurcated roots are more common in multi-rooted teeth. Among the options, the maxillary central incisor, mandibular lateral incisor, and mandibular central incisor are all single-rooted teeth. The mandibular premolar, however, can sometimes have two roots, making it bifurcated.", "answer_choice": "D. Mandibular premolar"}
